yearsOfLife: 28 january of 1940 year - antil our time
shortAbout: Леони́д Марти́нович Дайне́ко (w.b. 1940) — soviet and belarusian writer,autor of historicals novel.  Laureate of the Literary Award UW BSSR by name of Melej (1988). Laureate of the Gaverment  Award  BSSR (1990).

biography.info: Was bern   in country side  Dmitrieuka 2 by Klichevsk area of Magilev place in the family of peasants  Fekli Ivanovni and Martin Stepanovich . There was 7 children in the family .
graduated from the journalism department of the philological faculty of the Belarusian State University.
jubilee medal 'For Valiant Labor in commemoration of the 100th anniversary of the birth of V. I. Lenin'.
Literary Prize. I.Melezha for the novel 'Меч князя Вячкі'.
State Prize of the BSSR in the field of literature for works for children (novels'Меч князя Вячкі' and 'След ваўкалака'.
Novel «Запомним себя молодыми» reveals the complex events of the revolution, civil war, the struggle against the occupiers, the formation of the Belarusian statehood in 1917-1919.
